an3.46:1.1: “Mendicants, when ethical renunciates are supported by a town or village,
an3.46:1.2: the people there make much merit in three ways.
an3.46:1.4: By way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.46:1.5: When ethical renunciates are supported by a town or village,
an3.46:1.6: the people there make much merit in these three ways.”
